actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a project for pumped-storage hydropower development and other purposes at Fort Randall Dam-Lake Francis Case, South Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a pumped-storage hydroelectric facility as part of the Fort Randall Dam-Lake Francis Case project, South Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of a project for pumped-storage hydropower development and other purposes at Fort Randall Dam-Lake Francis Case, South Dakota.
